gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Grizzlies 106, Nets 102
gameRecap.excerpt: Coach Jenkins gets his 200th win as Memphis defeats Brooklyn, 106-102. For Memphis, Luke Kennard led the way with 25 points (six 3PM) and seven assists while Jake LaRavia added 14 points, 10 rebounds, and two steals in the victory. Nic Claxton tallied 21 points and six rebounds with Cameron Johnson recording 18 points, five rebounds, and three assists for Brooklyn in the losing effort. Memphis improves to 21-41 on the season, while Brooklyn moves to 24-37 with the loss.
